name: vega-lite
author: Jeffrey Heer, Dominik Moritz, Kanit "Ham" Wongsuphasawat
description: Vega-lite provides a higher-level grammar for visual analysis, comparable to ggplot or Tableau, that generates complete Vega specifications.

scripts.build: tsc && cp package.json build && browserify src/vl.ts -p tsify -g [ babelify ] -d -s vl | exorcist build/vega-lite.js.map > build/vega-lite.js
scripts.postbuild: uglifyjs build/vega-lite.js -cm --in-source-map build/vega-lite.js.map --source-map build/vega-lite.min.js.map > build/vega-lite.min.js && npm run schema
scripts.clean: rm -rf build && rm -f vega-lite.* & find -E src test site examples -regex '.*\.(js|js.map|d.ts)' -delete & rm -rf examples/_diff examples/_original examples/_output examples/images && rm -rf data
scripts.prestart: npm run data && npm run build && scripts/index-examples
scripts.schema: typescript-json-schema --required true --noExtraProps true src/spec.ts ExtendedSpec > build/vega-lite-schema.json
scripts.presite: npm run build && npm run data && npm run build:site && npm run build:toc && npm run build:versions
scripts.test: tsc && npm run schema && npm run data && npm run test:nocompile
scripts.test:nocompile: npm run test:only && npm run lint && npm run mocha:examples
scripts.test:debug: tsc && npm run schema && npm run data && mocha --recursive --require ./test/babel.ts --debug-brk build/test build/examples
scripts.watch:build: watchify src/vl.ts -p tsify -g [ babelify ] -v -d -s vl -o 'exorcist build/vega-lite.js.map > build/vega-lite.js'
scripts.watch: nodemon -x 'npm run build && npm run test:nocompile' # already ran schema in build
